name: tm79
effect: Teaches Dark Pulse to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Frost Breath to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Dark Pulse)

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user blows its cold breath on the target. This attack always results in a critical hit.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user blows its cold breath on the target. This attack always results in a critical hit.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user blows its cold breath on the target. This attack always results in a critical hit.
